banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: How can we give our kids a brighter future?
videoData.socialTitle: How can we give our kids a brighter future?

nodes.whoTheyAre: In a world in which corporate entities can be as influential as governments, Richard Neville is convinced that consumers will prefer to support brands that put good things in the world. His agency Animl works with Unilever’s Dirt Is Good brands to understand the changing nature of childhood in the 21st century.

videoData.description: Strap video cameras to their foreheads! To better understand child development, Richard Neville decided to see the world from a child's point of view. What did he observe? Children want to learn, and we might just be getting in their way...
videoData.socialDescription: Strap video cameras to their foreheads! To better understand child development, Richard Neville decided to see the world from a child's point of view. What did he observe? Children want to learn, and we might just be getting in their way...
